name: Amazon AppFlow
short: A fully managed service on AWS for securely transferring data between popular cloud services.
description: Amazon AppFlow is an AWS service for securely and efficiently transferring data between cloud services like Salesforce, Slack, and Zendesk. It automates data flows with a simple, no-code UI, allowing users to quickly configure the data they want to move. AppFlow also supports bidirectional flows, allowing data to be synced in both directions between services. It's easy to use and secure, and integrates with AWS security standards like IAM, KMS, and VPC.
